revised_title: Meteor 3-01 Rocket Orbit Analysis at 13th-Order Resonance
tldr: The authors analyzed the orbit of the Meteor 3-01 rocket (1985-100B) at 13th-order resonance, using 5865 observations to determine four lumped harmonic coefficients of order 13 and two of order 26 in the geopotential. The results provide a stringent test of comprehensive geopotential models at 13th order and are some of the most accurate obtained by any method for geopotential harmonics of this order.
